Headline: #63W West 63rd Temporary Reroute at 63rd/Mayfield
ShortDescription: 63W West 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, Central, 65th, Austin, and 63rd due to, street blockage near 63rd/Mayfield.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#63W West 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 63rd, Central, 65th, Austin, and 63rd due to, street blockage near 63rd/Mayfield.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #65 Grand Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Grand/Laramie
ShortDescription: EB 65 Grand buses are temporarily rerouted via Grand, Laramie, North Ave, Cicero and Grand, due to, street blockage near Grand/Laramie.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #65 Grand buses are temporarily rerouted via Grand, Laramie, North Ave, Cicero and Grand, due to, street blockage near Grand/Laramie.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
